content.question: A charged object with a net charge of <math alttext="positive 10 millicoulombs" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>10</mn><mo>‚Å¢</mo><mtext> </mtext><mtext> mC</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> moves perpendicularly to a uniform magnetic field with magnitude <math alttext="5 Tesla" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mtext>5 T</mtext></mrow></math> . The force exerted on the object by the magnetic field is <math alttext="0.5 newtons" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mtext>0.5 N</mtext></mrow></math>. What is the magnitude of the velocity of the object?

choices.label: <math alttext="0.01 meters per second" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mtext>0.01 m/s</mtext></mrow></math>
<math alttext="0.1 meters per second" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mtext>0.1 m/s</mtext></mrow></math>
<math alttext="10 meters per second" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mtext>10 m/s</mtext></mrow></math>
<math alttext="100 meters per second" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mtext>100 m/s</mtext></mrow></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="10 meters per second" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mtext>10 m/s</mtext></mrow></math>

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
